title: Leirsa
description: A grizzled hound. Once an outsider, now the Sentry of the North.

title: North Clan
description: One of the four ancient clans, residing in the frozen sheets.

title: Timeline

title: Flourite Crystals
description: A sacred relic and tool of all Houndkind for ceremonial use and viewing / storing memories.
